comment: Great professor, explained precalc in a way that just made sense. Do the homework, read the text, and just show up to class, and you'll get your A.

Mrs. Lossner is a great teacher, though she does give homework and takes it up it will help you. 4 tests and a final exam. If you have an A in the class and have made at least 1 A on one of the tests then you can exempt the final. I made a B, and I studied regularly. Would take again.
Great Teacher!
Took it a second time with her and passed! She cares about her students and is willing to help. She wants everyone to do well!
She gives extra credit on tests and partial credit, if you have to take this course take her.

Mrs. Lossner is the best Math teacher I've ever had. I failed 1st semester because of a bad teacher and took her this semester and made an A. She gives lots of extra credit. Everything she quizes you on is on the test. She is always willing to help you. She uses the book and then takes up certain HWs for completion. If you fail its on you. Take her
easy a or b if you just study a little.  Take her.

She is a great professor. She is clear about what she expects. She gives quizzes once a week but will drop your quiz grades if you score higher on the test. She gives study guides for every test and they're usually structured just like the test. Would definitely recommend her.

Sweetest & easiest professor I've ever had. She's clear about what will be on tests AND she gives a study guide for almost all of them. She will work with you to get the grade that you want & to understand the material. She is very fair grader. She will give quizzes every so often, so be prepared. If she sees that you are trying, she will LOVE you.

Professor Lossner is the sweetest professor ever! She's not always clear on the concepts I had to do the extra practice problems and read a little from the book especially when it came to trig but she's always there to help! she provides a study guide for test almost identical to test. really hard not to pass unless you really struggle with math

Professor Lossner was so sweet! If math isn't your subject then her class may be a little tough, but she is always willing to help. Quiz every week but the homework ends up being worth more than the quizzes at the end of the semester. She is a little ditzy but easily one of the most helpful teachers. Go to SI sessions and study. Would take again.
She is a very easy professor and cares about her students. Really makes sure you understand.

She is so sweet and very passionate about math. She answers any questions you have and is always open to help you outside of class. There was an SI session for this class and the professor gave the SI instructor the exact quizzes and tests so go to these sessions if you need extra help.

She goes over any questions that you may have on homework every class.  She tends to put the questions on the test that she review on the board so write them down.  Buy the book those are her test questions.

You must do the extra math problems that aren't in math lab or you are toast.  Many test questions come from the extra problems that the complaining students don't bother to do.  Do all the math lab and extra problems and you will get an A or B.

Incredibly air headed professor. I am sure she knew the math she was teaching at one point, but it was blatantly obvious she forgot most of it. On a daily basis, students would correct the mistakes she made on the board. MyMathLab taught me everything and its really the only reason I got an A. She is a nice lady and helped with grades near the end.

She is one of the sweetest professors I have ever had! She is very approachable and offers numerous chances to get extra credit. The whole class did bad on a test and she let us all earn points back on it. Do not waste your money on the textbook!! Take her!

Professor Lossner is the best math teacher I have ever had. She is very willing to help all her students succeed in her class. She gives lots of extra credit and is very approachable. If you do not do well it is your own fault. Do not buy the textbook, just study her worksheets. TAKE HER!!

She is an awesome professor. I would highly recommend her. She is very helpful and wants to see you succeed. She gives worksheets for every section, 10 homework assignments excluding mymathlab, quizzes for every chapter, three tests, and a final. Everything she gives you is to help you/ your overall grade; gives extra credit on quizzes and test!

Amazing professor! I used to struggle with math but she explains everything so well. She's also more than willing to help her students, and really wants to see you succeed. She provides helpful study guides, reviews, and worksheets. Always do the homework and worksheets. And always try to do well on the quizzes- they're there to help you!

I've been out of college for a while, and Ms. Lossner and this class was a great way to get introduced back to college. I took Pre-Calc and Calculus a LONG time ago, but she's made it great. She gives you study guides, which are identical to the test. The homework is very helpful - you need to do it. She's great. I wish she taught more classes.
Terrible! To understand her, you may have wanted to be on the math team in high school. She doesn't explain well at all.

I am taking professor Lossner right now and I have to say she is a wonderful teacher.   She teaches high school so she is VERY patient with people, and she explains things really well.  There is a lot of book homework but tests are not tricky and very easy to pass as long as you go to class and listen. She breaks math down really well.
